thread.title: Tamara M Linville
thread.title_full: Fabletics reviewed by Tamara M Linville

author: Tamara M Linville
title: Tamara M Linville
text: I didn't realize until time of purchase, that by accepting the special promo pricing I was also accepting a monthly $50 purchase plan that I am now required to call to opt out of...I'll accept it to get the promo pricing but I think it should be explained up front
